coreAtributes.name: Platemail Cuisse
coreAtributes.description: A set of hip armor made up of multiple metal plates layered on top of one another.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your platemail cuisse.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s platemail cuisse and roughly pull them off [npc.her] hips.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your platemail cuisse and roughly pulls them off your hips.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s platemail cuisse and roughly pulls them off [npc2.her] hips.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the platemail cuisse.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put [npc.name]'s platemail cuisse on [npc.her] hips.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the platemail cuisse on [npc.her] hips.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts your platemail cuisse on your hips.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly puts the platemail cuisse on your hips.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts [npc2.name]'s platemail cuisse on their hips.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s platemail cuisse and roughly puts them on [npc2.her] hips.
